isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WEST COAST MAGNUM MIRRORS AND AERO MIRRORS - WEST COAST AND AERO MIRROR COMMON SERVICE PROCEDURES - Install Mirror "C" Loop On Vehicle

step1.para: Align the upper and the lower isolator pads on the mounting brackets. Pads should stay in place on each mounting bracket. Check edge to edge alignment all around.
Position mirror assembly to door and install (2) upper mounting bolts. Thread bolts in far enough to allow mirror to hang in position.
Pull cab wire harness through the hole in the lower mounting bracket/isolator pad and connect the "C" loop harness connector to the cab harness. Pull the ground strap clear of the mounting base.
Align the lower mounting base with the mounting holes in the door, align ground strap eyelet with one of the mounting holes in the bracket and install (4) mounting bolts. Hand tighten.
Tighten upper mounting bolts to 34-41 Nm (25-30 lbf - ft).
Tighten lower bolts to 34-41 Nm (25-30 lbf - ft).
At the lower mounting bracket, push excess wire back into the "C" loop and using a wire tie secure the wire harness/connector to the tab on the mounting bracket.
